content:
@James Agnew trying to connect to BCBS server at https://bcbsa-bb.smilecdr.com/ but authorization page fails:

image.png

any idea?
Also, I am using the client id and client secret from the sign up sheet, but are they good for any redirect URL ?
Hi @James Agnew, OneRecord would like to test as well if you can provide the redirect URL for the client id and secret. Thanks!

Hi @James Agnew - I'm trying to connect to bcbs server as well, but I'm getting a 404 from the authorization endpoint. Is this the correct url: https://bcbsa-bb.smilecdr.com:9200/oauth/authorize I've tried it with and without the port
